name: Mihir Bellare
content: Mihir Bellare Homepage Department of Computer Science and Engineering University of California San Diego mihir at eng dot ucsd dot edu My research is in cryptography, with emphasis on provable-security for primitives of applied interest. I am interested in how technology shapes our thinking and society, and taught a course in that vein called Seeing the Invisible. Looking for a research topic in cryptography?
